readable.title: 459284240_5a4167bf92
readable.content: A toddler starting at a clown walking down a snowy sidewalk . Several people including a child and a clown are walking towards a snowy sidewalk Three adults and a toddler stand on a snowy path . Three adults and one child are walking along a paved path that is snow covered . Two adults , a child , and a clown walking down a sidewalk .
